Action.author: bmos299
Action.body: Changing to HIGH from HIGHEST. Nishi thinks it could have been caused by a config error which she will post. However, it is still a bug (NULL EXCEPTION). If she hits again for the config change she will move back to highest.

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: ~bmos299 ~Nishi Can we update this and mark as done by EOD if not relevant? Thanks!

Action.author: nishi
Action.body: This is not reproducible with our current e2e configuration that has 2 kafka servers and an orderer. Closing this issue.
